Home resource lists all rooms in a home and all devices which are not assigned to a room.
Home only contains resources of type "device" and "room"

ClipMessage.description: Basic message body for all return messages on GET, data contains full expanded resource

ColorTemperatureMirek.description: color temperature in mirek or null when the light color is not in the ct spectrum

DependencyGet.description: Defines target resource of a dependency.

DependencyLevel.description:
#- non_critical: Defines a dependency between resources: although source is impacted by removal of target, source remains of target means removal of source.
- critical: Defines a critical dependency between resources: source cannot function without target, hence removal of target means removal of source.

DependerGet.description: Represents all the resources which depend on a resource.

Duration.description: Duration of a light transition in ms. Accuracy is in 100ms steps.

EntertainmentChannelGet.description: Holds position of the channel and list of members, which is an array of segments resource identifiers

channel_id.description: Bridge assigns a number upon creation. This is the number to be used by the HueStream API when addressing the channel

position.description: xyz position of this channel. It is the average position of its members

members.description: List that references segments that are members of that channel

name.description: Friendly name of the entertainment configuration

configuration_type.description:
Defines for which type of application this channel assignment was optimized for
"screen" : Channels are organized around content from a screen "music": Channels are organized for music synchronization "3dspace: Channels are organized to provide 3d spacial effects "other": General use case

status.description: Read only field reporting if the stream is active or not

active_streamer.description: Expected value is of a ResourceIdentifier of the type auth_v1

channels.description: Holds the channels. Each channel groups segments of one or different light

locations.description: Entertertainment services of the lights that are in the zone have locations

action.description:
If status is "inactive" -> write start to start streaming. Writing start when it's already active
does not change the owership of the streaming. If status is "active" -> write "stop" to end the current streaming. In order to start streaming when other application is already streaming first write "stop" and then "start"

EntertainmentLocations.description: Sets the position of each entertainment service in the configuration. If the service has several segments, more than one x,y,z location may be needed

grouped_services.description:
References all services aggregating control and state of services in the group.
This includes all services grouped in the group hiearchy given by child relation This includes all services of a device grouped in the group hiearchy given by child relation Aggregation is per service type, ie every service type which can be grouped has a corresponding definition of grouped type Supported types "light"
